Oct 4 (Reuters) - Airtel Africa PLC AAF.L:: *AIRTEL AFRICA PLC - OFFER TO BUYOUT AIRTEL NIGERIA MINORITIES *AIRTEL AFRICA - TOTAL CONSIDERATION IS ESTIMATED TO BE NGN 61.24 BN *AIRTEL AFRICA - SEEKS TO BUY BACK 8.27% MINORITY SHAREHOLDINGS AT AN OFFER PRICE OF NGN 55.81 PER SHARE *AIRTEL AFRICA - SUBSIDIARY INITIATED A PROCESS UNDER WHICH IT SEEKS TO BUY BACK 8.27% MINORITY SHAREHOLDINGS AT AN OFFER PRICE OF NGN 55.81 PER SHARE


((Reuters Investor Briefs; email: reutersinvestor.briefs@thomsonreuters.com)) Source Date/Time = 04-OCT-202107:00:07 GMT
